name: NFTIZ
description:
NFTIZ is a Figma plugin that enables you to transform your design into a NFT. With NFTIZ, it's super easy to turn your Figma creations into NFT, put them on sale on OpenSea or send them as gifts to your friends.  


How to transform your design into NFT with NFTIZ?

  1. Open the NFTIZ plugin
  2. Select the frame you want to mint
  3. Fulfill the form with a name, a description and the Ethereum address where you want to receive your NFT â‡’ Click on "Mint"

Easy as 1,2,3...


https://nftiz-app.xyz/
